title: Evaluate LLM mana tapping accuracy vs token cost
description:
Now that explicit mana sourcing is available via mana_plan, we need to evaluate how well various models handle manual tapping.

Tasks:
- Analyze game logs to measure how often mana_plan entries fail (ID not available, wrong type)
- Compare token cost of mana_plan usage vs auto_tap for different spell complexities
- Track how often GAME_CHOOSE_ABILITY deferrals happen (multi-ability lands) and whether models handle them correctly
- If models get lots of failures, consider creating an auto-tap-only MCP tool they can use as a simpler alternative
- Determine if certain model families (e.g. smaller models) should default to auto_tap while larger models benefit from mana_plan
